description.default: This record may be used in flows to indicate that it belongs to Aviation Security. Its business unit is listed as Aviation Security Directorate – Domestic, but that’s misleading. It is actually used for all of Aviation Security, both Domestic AND International.

label.description: This record may be used in flows to indicate that it belongs to Aviation Security. Its business unit is listed as Aviation Security Directorate – Domestic, but that’s misleading. It is actually used for all of Aviation Security, both Domestic AND International.
